amendment.description: To require a report on security measures to ensure that data contained in the Joint Advertising, Market Research and Studies (JAMRS) program is maintained and protected.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4522 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4522 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6378) To require a report on security measures to ensure that data contained in the Joint Advertising, Market Research and Studies (JAMRS) program is maintained and protected.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4522 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4522 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
